name: The heavy claymore called 'The Frostbrand' (2h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (awesome in general).
It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It does cold damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
Three Shards of the Gods can be embedded into the mighty blade of this sword.
